blogPost.excerpt: Shoutout makes it incredibly easy to tap into your existing social proof and turn it into a beautiful "Wall of Love". Capture, curate, and publish a wall in less than 3 minutes 💯
blogPost.body: Shoutout makes it incredibly easy to tap into your existing social proof and turn it into a beautiful "Wall of Love". Capture, curate, and publish a wall in less than 3 minutes 💯
blogPost.title: Shoutout - Attract more customers by highlighting why people trust you
blogPost.author: KP

localize.description: Shoutout让你非常容易地挖掘现有的社交证明，并将其变成美丽的 "爱之墙"。在不到3分钟的时间内捕捉、策划和发布一面墙 💯。
localize.tagline: 通过强调人们信任你的原因来吸引更多的客户。

localize.description: Shoutout讓你非常容易地挖掘現有的社交證明，並將其變成美麗的 "愛之牆"。在不到3分鐘的時間內捕捉、策劃和發佈一面牆 💯。
localize.tagline: 通過強調人們信任你的原因來吸引更多的客戶。

previous.excerpt: Pulse is a private, 27,000+ verified member community for technology leaders to learn from their peers. Members can ask questions, create polls, and engage in conversations for instant insights. Over 16,000+ new data points are gathered each week in Pulse.
previous.title: Pulse - A community for technology leaders to learn from each other

localize.description: Pulse是一个私人的、超过27,000名经过验证的会员社区，供技术领导者向同行学习。会员可以提出问题，创建投票，并参与对话以获得即时见解。Pulse每周收集超过16,000+个新数据点。
localize.tagline: 技术领导者相互学习的社区

localize.description: Pulse是一個私人的、超過27,000名經過驗證的會員社區，供技術領導者向同行學習。會員可以提出問題，創建投票，並參與對話以獲得即時見解。Pulse每週收集超過16,000+個新數據點。
localize.tagline: 技術領導者相互學習的社區

next.excerpt: Runops is a command-line app that lets you query databases and manage servers using a single tool. It adds Git versioning, reviews in Slack, and sensitive data masking to every command you run from the terminal.
next.title: Runops - Run one-off scripts as production-ready automations

localize.description: Runops是一款命令行应用，让你可以用一个工具查询数据库和管理服务器。它为你从终端运行的每一条命令增加了Git版本管理、Slack中的审查和敏感数据屏蔽功能。
localize.tagline: 将一次性脚本作为生产就绪的自动程序运行

localize.description: Runops是一款命令行應用，讓你可以用一個工具查詢數據庫和管理服務器。它爲你從終端運行的每一條命令增加了Git版本管理、Slack中的審查和敏感數據屏蔽功能。
localize.tagline: 將一次性腳本作爲生產就緒的自動程序運行
